page.title: 16The Life Of A Policeman.
page.content: by Natasha Peace The policeman in Astley has lived in the station for 3 years and 3 months. He is the only policeman there and has been in the police force for 5 years and 6 months.Before he moved to Astley he was based in Kidderminster.He works an 8 hour shift for 28 days and has 8 days off including 1 weekend.He covers an area of 200 sq.miles.He has about 3 or 4 calls a day on his radio which are passed through from Kidderminster and Stourport stations.Because the area covered is mainly rural there are chiefly petty crimes,poaching etc,although there are many road accidents caused by narrow winding roads with concealed entrances.
